name: bejabbers
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of surprise or emphasis: Bejabbers! There's nothing left! Sure and bejabbers, they'll be back in the morning. Bejabers! I didn't expect that to happen. Synonym
bejesus
More examplesFewer examplesBejabbers! What was he thinking?Well, sure, bejabbers, they'll tell you.
